message.raw:
* segway/cluster/sge_setup.py:
(sge_setup): use Python 2.6 NamedTemporaryFile(delete=False)

* segway/run.py: change window_coords to use Window
(Results): new namedtuple subclass replaces tuple
(Runner.run_train_multithread): use itertools.product(), fix
	"include_cords" typo

* segway/output.py, segway/observations.py: change window_coords to use Window

* segway/layer.py (layer): remove comment

* segway/_util.py (NamedTemporaryDir): remove
(_Window): new name for Window
(Window): new class to allow __len__

* NEWS: update

message:
* segway/cluster/sge_setup.py:
(sge_setup): use Python 2.6 NamedTemporaryFile(delete=False)

* segway/run.py: change window_coords to use Window
(Results): new namedtuple subclass replaces tuple
(Runner.run_train_multithread): use itertools.product(), fix
	"include_cords" typo

* segway/output.py, segway/observations.py: change window_coords to use Window

* segway/layer.py (layer): remove comment

* segway/_util.py (NamedTemporaryDir): remove
(_Window): new name for Window
(Window): new class to allow __len__

* NEWS: update
